text: The Football Association Challenge Vase is an annual football competition. It is run by and named after The Football Association (The FA), It is for teams playing in Steps 5 and 6 of the English National League System. Nearly 600 teams participate in this knockout competition with semi-finals played over two legs. The final is played at Wembley Stadium. The 2024 winners were Romford, who beat Great Wakering Rovers 3â€“0 at Wembley Stadium. ==References== ==Other websites== *The FA Vase at the FA website 9 Category:Recurring sporting events established in 1974 Category:Amateur association football competitions Category:Vase sports trophies
title: FA Vase
